dmca.title: DMCA notice
dmca.body:
I was sued in January by these two very angry, evil men for linking
to their web site and criticising their "churches". I am a Christian
pastor, as well as a researcher in the field of autocephalic Christian churches in the apostolic succession. My wife and I, prior to
the lawsuit, had been harassed something awful by these two men, for
over two years. 

My web site, ind-movement.org, was knocked off a 
three different hosting providers due to the so-called DMCA notices
and treachery from Mr. James and Mr. Prentice: Interland, WebservePro,
and most recently, Web2010/Hostcentric. 

In addition, these two evil
men have defamed us all over the usenet and on the web something 
horrible these past two years. (Most of the web postings were very
recently removed.) Finally, these two evil men have tortiously 
interfered in almost every facet of our lives. They repeatedly tried
to get me fired from my day job as a systems manager for a large
financial institution. They got us both kicked out of the Boy Scouts of America where we had both been serving as adult volunteers (I as
a troop chaplain). They've spammed hundreds of clergy with emails
accusing us of the most terrible things. They've emailed and telephoned
many of our relatives and tried to interrupt our intra-family
relationships.

The case is currently in U.S. District Court in Denver, Colorado:
02-CV-117. I have much of it documented at
http://www.ind-movement.org/lawsuit/

I would be most grateful if chillingeffects.org could briefly
document my situation -- that I have been sued for linking, that the DMCA was used against my web site on the issue of linking,
and that the DMCA was cited as a novel way to harass me.

Thank you.

(Mr. James and Mr. Prentice present themselves as elevated clergy
and heads of two major "Christian" churches. Two tiny tidbits that
may erase that: Mr. James published his first work on applied astrology
in 1978. Mr. James was also the topic of a newspaper article in
The Boulder Weekly -- this article is archived at 
http://web.archive.org/web/19990826162636/http://www.boulderweekly.com/article.cfm?aid=479  )
dmca.principal_name: Joseph Colin James III & Victor Prentice dba The Continuing Episcopal Church Inc. and
